definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen

sentences.english: Our Party warned time and again that leading cadres should follow the mass lines.
sentences.chinese: 我党一再三令五申领导干部要走群众路线。

sentences.english: The government has given repeated orders that drivers must not use mobile phones while driving.
sentences.chinese: 政府三令五申司机不能在开车时打手机。

sentences.english: All of you must know that the repeated injunctions must be obeyed.
sentences.chinese: 你们必须都知道，三令五申的法令要遵守。

sentences.english: The county repeatedly enjoined that everything must be done according to law.
sentences.chinese: 县里曾三令五申，干什么都得按法律办事。

sentences.english: The government gives repeated instructions to do well in the environmental protection job.
sentences.chinese: 政府三令五申要搞好环保工作。

definition: The higher ups have policies while the lower downs have their own ways of getting around them. (idiom)
pinyin: shang4 you3 zheng4 ce4 , xia4 you3 dui4 ce4

definition: outward devotion but inner opposition (idiom); to pay lip service/to agree overtly, but oppose in secret
to fabricate excuses (idiom)/to concoct various items (e.g. to pad an expense account)

pinyin: zheng1 yi1 yan3 bi4 yi1 yan3
zheng1 yi1 zhi1 yan3 bi4 yi1 zhi1 yan3

definition: to break the law and violate discipline (idiom)
